original_text: Despite their fear of the peoples around them, they built the altar on its foundation and sacrificed burnt offerings on it to the Lord, both the morning and evening sacrifices.
korean_text: 무리가 모든 나라 백성을 두려워하여 제단을 그 터에 세우고 그 위에서 아침 저녁으로 여호와께 번제를 드리며

sentences.original_text: Despite their fear of the peoples around them
sentences.korean_translation: 그들을 둘러싼 민족들에 대한 두려움에도 불구하고

sentences.original_text: they built the altar on its foundation
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 제단을 기초 위에 세웠고

sentences.original_text: and sacrificed burnt offerings on it
both the morning and evening sacrifices
